CREATE CREDENTIAL [comosdbdataengineer]
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'k5YGdk7QCarN5iEKRiXskU11Cfs0fsFmC3Q3v8Xt21RkrJsj5R0SRQl1CVN5YQqHtA4JjvYX4RQwosuuQ8D1Yg=='
GO


SELECT TOP 100 
RideId
,PickupLocationId
,Rating
,Feedback
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=comosdbdataengineer;Database=RidesDB',
                OBJECT = 'RidesFeedback',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'comosdbdataengineer'
) AS [RidesFeedback]
